input.content:
name: CI

on:
  push:
    branches: [ main ]
  pull_request:
    branches: [ main ]

jobs:
  test:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    strategy:
      matrix:
        python-version: ["3.12", "3.13"]

    steps:
    - uses: actions/checkout@v4

    - name: Install uv
      uses: astral-sh/setup-uv@v4
      with:
        enable-cache: true

    - name: Set up Python ${{ matrix.python-version }}
      run: uv python install ${{ matrix.python-version }}

    - name: Install dependencies
      run: uv sync --all-extras --dev

    - name: Run tests
      run: uv run pytest

    - name: Run linting
      run: uv run ruff check

    - name: Run formatting check
      run: uv run ruff format --check

    - name: Run type checking
      run: uv run pyright

name: CI

on:
  push:
    branches: [ main ]
  pull_request:
    branches: [ main ]

jobs:
  test:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    strategy:
      matrix:
        python-version: ["3.12", "3.13"]

    steps:
    - uses: actions/checkout@v4

    - name: Install uv
      uses: astral-sh/setup-uv@v4
      with:
        enable-cache: true

    - name: Set up Python ${{ matrix.python-version }}
      run: uv python install ${{ matrix.python-version }}

    - name: Install dependencies
      run: uv sync --all-extras --dev

    - name: Run tests
      run: uv run pytest

    - name: Run linting
      run: uv run ruff check

    - name: Run formatting check
      run: uv run ruff format --check

    - name: Run type checking
      run: uv run pyright

file.content:
[project]
name = "claude-code-log"
version = "0.1.0"
description = "Convert Claude transcript JSONL files to HTML"
readme = "README.md"
requires-python = ">=3.12"
license = { text = "MIT" }
dependencies = [
    "click>=8.0.0",
    "dateparser>=1.0.0",
    "pydantic>=2.0.0",
    "jinja2>=3.0.0",
]

[project.scripts]
claude-code-log = "claude_code_log.cli:main"

[build-system]
requires = ["hatchling"]
build-backend = "hatchling.build"

[tool.pytest.ini_options]
testpaths = ["test"]
asyncio_mode = "auto"
asyncio_default_fixture_loop_scope = "function"

[tool.pyright]
# Pyright configuration with strict settings
include = ["claude_code_log"]
exclude = ["**/__pycache__", "dist"]
stubPath = "stubs"
venvPath = "."
venv = ".venv"
reportMissingImports = true
reportMissingTypeStubs = true
pythonVersion = "3.12"
pythonPlatform = "All"
typeCheckingMode = "strict"
reportUnknownMemberType = true
reportUnknownParameterType = true
reportUnknownVariableType = true
reportUnknownArgumentType = true
reportPrivateImportUsage = true
reportUntypedFunctionDecorator = true
reportFunctionMemberAccess = true
reportIncompatibleMethodOverride = true

[tool.ruff]
target-version = "py312"

[dependency-groups]
dev = [
    "pytest>=8.3.5",
    "pytest-asyncio>=0.25.3",
    "ruff>=0.11.2",
    "pytest-xdist>=3.6.1",
    "pyright>=1.1.350",
]

name: CI

on:
  push:
    branches: [ main ]
  pull_request:
    branches: [ main ]

jobs:
  test:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    strategy:
      matrix:
        python-version: ["3.12", "3.13"]

    steps:
    - uses: actions/checkout@v4

    - name: Install uv
      uses: astral-sh/setup-uv@v4
      with:
        enable-cache: true

    - name: Set up Python ${{ matrix.python-version }}
      run: uv python install ${{ matrix.python-version }}

    - name: Install dependencies
      run: uv sync --all-extras --dev

    - name: Run tests
      run: uv run pytest

    - name: Run linting
      run: uv run ruff check

    - name: Run formatting check
      run: uv run ruff format --check

    - name: Run type checking
      run: uv run pyright

content.thinking:
The user is asking about two things:
1. The GitHub Action only runs on main branch - they want it to run on all pushes
2. They want me to fix the type issues since the CLAUDE.md shows `uv run pyright` as one of the development commands

Let me first update the GitHub Action to run on all pushes, then fix the type issues.

Looking at the current workflow:
```yaml
on:
  push:
    branches: [ main ]
  pull_request:
    branches: [ main ]
```

They want it to run on all pushes, so I should change it to:
```yaml
on:
  push:
  pull_request:
    branches: [ main ]
```

Then I need to fix the type issues. From the error output, it looks like there are issues in `claude_code_log/converter.py` with unknown types, particularly around file handling and pathlib operations.
